name: Go Worker Go
body:
# Go Worker Go! [![Trailer](https://github.com/UnityGameDesign/DockGame/blob/master/screenshot_trailer.png?raw=true)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n5MXs-cP6Ss) ### Click [Here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n5MXs-cP6Ss) to Watch Trailer! *** ### Initial Version Download Address (Web or Mac): **[Web Version](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BwwfrO3cKN7hcHU2Rm9kczBkMUE)**

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BwwfrO3cKN7hcHU2Rm9kczBkMUE

Once you download the zip file, please unzip it and open the html page "DockGame_v4.html". *** **[Mac Version](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BwwfrO3cKN7hMjVyUWs2ZTJ3NHc)**

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BwwfrO3cKN7hMjVyUWs2ZTJ3NHc

Once you download the zip file, please unzip it and open the application "DockGame_v4" under Contents/MacOS. *** ### Warning: Please DO NOT download the game through button! *** ### Game Screenshots ![Dock Aerial View](https://github.com/UnityGameDesign/DockGame/blob/master/Environment.png?raw=true) ![Start Interface](https://github.com/UnityGameDesign/DockGame/blob/master/Screenshot1.png?raw=true) ![End Interface](https://github.com/UnityGameDesign/DockGame/blob/master/Screenshot4.png?raw=true) # First-person Perspective Version ![Screenshot1](https://github.com/UnityGameDesign/DockGame/blob/master/Screenshot2.jpg?raw=true) ![Screenshot2](https://github.com/UnityGameDesign/DockGame/blob/master/Screenshot3.png?raw=true) # Third-person Perspective Version ![Screenshot3](https://github.com/UnityGameDesign/DockGame/blob/master/Third-person1.JPG?raw=true) ![Screenshot4](https://github.com/UnityGameDesign/DockGame/blob/master/Third-person2.JPG?raw=true) *** ### Game Rules: 1. The playerâ€™s mission is to collect enough coins within 5 minutes. Only by completing the mission can the player win the game. 2. There are 5 types of monster. The larger size of it is the higher damage to the dock worker. 3. Credits will be rewarded by killing Orc or collecting coins. 4. Being attacked too many times or falling into the sea causes the death of the character. *** ### How to play the game #### Without mouse:
  • Move: use direction keys (right, left, forward, backward)
  • Jump: space
  • View: single finger in touch pad
  • Shoot: right Shift, or click the touch pad
#### With mouse:
  • Move: use direction keys (right, left, forward, backward)
  • Jump: space
  • View: sway the mouse
  • Shoot: left click mouse
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
